name: Love Letter From the Future
author: yeohan
content: Ian Percus, a third-year student from the Academy&#039s swordship department, wakes up one morning to find a flip calendar on his desk and a letter he doesn&#039t remember receiving. The letter contains a cryptic message: &quotIf we don&#039t protect the future, the world will perish.&quotWhen he goes to the Academy, he finds out that, unbeknownst to him, a week has passed and that during that time, he defeated a previously undefeated junior. At first, Ian is skeptical, but as the events describ
